Invocation Name: live smart
des:
If you are using LS Mini or Hub, please activate this skill first.
You can use your voice to control the home appliances and rules set by LS App.

＜The list of operable devices>
Air conditioner
Television
Ceiling light
Rule.
Smart light
AV equipment such as speakers
Other IR devices


To activate your LiveSmart skills
1. Download the LiveSmart app and complete the configuration with each device.
2. In the Alexa app, select "ENABLE TO USE" for the LiveSmart Smart Home
3. Link your account and enter the account and password you registered with the LiveSmart app.
4. From the Alexa app, tap Smart Home, then Devices, then Add Device to discover the device. Alternatively, you can turn to Alexa and say "Find your device".
5. Talk to Alexa and enjoy your smart life!
